LOC_BENCHMARK_BUTTON_GRASS_TOOLTIP: This benchmark tests the Vertex system with grass rendering.
LOC_BENCHMARK_BUTTON_SPRITES_TOOLTIP: This is a showcase of the sprites from the game.
LOC_BENCHMARK_BUTTON_APPLE_TOOLTIP: This benchmark tests various shaders and rendering techniques.
LOC_BENCHMARK_BUTTON_TIME_TOOLTIP: This benchmark tests the Time system and its performance.
LOC_BENCHMARK_BUTTON_ANIMCURVE_TOOLTIP: This benchmark tests the Animation Curve system and its performance.
LOC_BENCHMARK_BUTTON_MP_TOOLTIP: This benchmark tests the Motion Planning system and its performance.
